isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - IC BUS SERVICE MANUAL - OPERATION - VANDAL LOCK SYSTEM

svcproc.title: VANDAL LOCK SYSTEM
svcproc.para: The vandal lock system is a device that locks entrance doors and or emergency doors or both. The vandal key lock is located at the rear or side doors ( Figure 18). Emergency doors when locked are equipped with a starter interlock that when activated, will not allow the engine to start. A key or dead bolt slide lock is used to lock the rear or side emergency door. When the rear and side emergency doors are locked, an alarm (buzzer) will sound to inform the operator the door is locked. To deactivate the system, simply unlock the appropriate door.
